featured.text: Over the course of the morning, the innovative discussion process 14 a new form of collective effort that transformed the depth, scope, and quality of their discussion.

definition.zh_def: 範圍；視野；能力或影響的範圍
definition.en_def: The extent of an area or subject matter that is covered or dealt with.
definition.example: The project has a wide scope that includes various aspects of environmental conservation.
